Ice Cream Vendor?

Enter your business email address and we'll get back to you with more information!

Why Choose Chimes?

Experience the convenience of never missing your favourite ice cream van again with our innovative features.

Real-time Tracking

Get live location updates of ice cream vans in your area. Know exactly when they're heading your way.

Instant Notifications

Receive push notifications (with our distinctive ice cream van chime) the moment an ice cream van enters your neighborhood. Never miss out again!

Search & Track

Can't wait for the van to come to you?

Expand your search area to discover ice cream vans in the wider area, then follow their live location as they move around your neighborhood.

Easy to Use

Simple setup, intuitive interface. Just set your post code, geofence circle size and let Chimes! do the rest.

Vendor Privacy

You are in complete control of when your location is visible to your customers!

Only show your location to your customers when you want to. Your location is completely hidden at all other times.

Free to get started

Always free for Whippy fans!

Free for vendors to be displayed on the app - with a free trial followed by a low cost for live location tracking and notifications to all of your customers.

Grow the Chimes Network!

No vans showing on the map?
Chimes only displays ice cream vans who have joined our network.

Use Share Chimes

Open the Chimes app, go to Settings and tap Share Chimes to easily share with friends, family and of course vendors!

How Chimes! Works

Getting started is simple. Follow these three easy steps and never miss your favourite ice cream again.

1

Set Your Location

Set your post code and notification radius right from the map.

2

Get Instant Notifications

Receive real-time push notifications with our distinctive Ice Cream Van Chime when ice cream vans enter your area.

3

Enjoy Your Ice Cream

Head out to meet the van and enjoy your favourite frozen treats!

Ready to get started?

Grow Your Business

Reach More Customers
